title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Kodansha_Manga_Award
transformers_text: The Kodansha Manga Award K dan sha Manga Sh is one of Japan's major manga awards The event is sponsored by publisher Kodansha It has been awarded annually for serialized manga in its third iteration since 1977 The award was originally called the Kodansha Children's Manga Award K dan sha Jid Manga Sh until 1968 In 1970 it was named Kodansha Cultural Award Children's manga category K dan sha Sh up pan Bunk a Sh Jid Manga Bum on The second version lasted until 1976 The company decided to create multiple categories thereafter 1 The award once was given out in four categories sh nen sh jo children and general The award was formalized into the present ceremony with initially offering categories only for sh nen and sh join 1977 The first award for the general category was in 1982 and the first children's category award was in 2003 The children's category was merged into the sh nen and sh jo categories starting in 2015 2 Each winning work will be honored with a bronze statuette a certificate and a prize of 1 million yen about US 7 500 3
